name: Tea Kettle for Stovetop, Barista's Choice Gooseneck Pour Over with Flow Control, Food Grade Stainless Steel Water Kettle, Tea Pot for Home & Kitchen - Small 28oz, Silver
short_description: PERFECT GOOSENECK SPOUT: Chefbar pour over tea kettle is designed with a precise gooseneck spout nozzle to help you control the water flow. Precise and smooth water flow is essential in making drip coffee and pouring over tea. Pour the right amount of water and pour at the right speed for consistent coffee extraction.

PREMIUM QUALITY & PERFECT SIZE: This 0.8 Liter (We Recommend 80% Full to Avoid Overflow), 28 oz, 4-tea-cup size tea kettle is made of premium 304 food grade stainless steel, making it more durable and rust resistant, yet still light-weighted.

ERGONOMIC HANDLE DESIGN: Goose neck water kettle with hot-resistant Bakelite handle, you can lift the handle up when boiling water and keep the flame on the bottom. Also, the slip-resistant grip ensure that the kettle does not slip when you are pouring.

STOVE TOP KETTLE: This stovetop kettle is applicable for induction cooker, electric furnace, gas, and natural gas stovetops. Please be careful when use it on open fire. Please use this tea kettle over small or medium heat, it heats extremely fast and saves energy.

After using the kettle, you may find the kettle forms water scale, NOT RUST!!! Don't worry, you can add vinegar, lemon juice or water scale remover in kettle with water boiled to effectively remove the water scale regularly. Moreover, Our 12-month after-sale service ensures your confidence with your purchase.

name: Electric Gooseneck Kettle Temperature Control, Pour Over Electric Kettle for Coffee and Tea, 100% Stainless Steel Inner, 1200W Rapid Heating, 0.8L, Built-in Stopwatch, Matte Black
short_description: 【Electric Kettle with Adjustable Temperature Control】Brew your beverage at the perfect temperature with Aiheal hot water electric kettle. Its temperature control ranges from 100°F-212°F and is adjustable by one degree for crafting your coffee or tea with precision

【Heated Base with Buttons and LCD Display】The heated base of the gooseneck coffee kettle has a temp setting button knob and two buttons——to keep warm and Fahrenheit/Celsius convert. The Fahrenheit/Celsius convert button also acts as a MUTE button. The temp setting knob can precisely adjust the required heating temperature. The LCD display panel can show the real temp when heating and keeping warm.

【Gooseneck Design & Precise Pouring】The unique gooseneck spout design of the electric kettle makes the kettle have a slow and steady flow of water when pouring. The sharp spout design enables precise pouring when brewing coffee or tea and is not easy to spill. The designed handle can stabilize the body of the pot when pouring water and prevent spills.

【Pure Taste & Safe Tech】The inner kettle is made with 304 food-grade stainless steel. Compared with other variable temp kettles, there is no silicon or plastic aside from the temp sensor. Featured NTC temp sensor, the kettle will automatically shut off once the water reaches your desired temperature.

【1200W Fast Heating】The high power of 1200W makes the gooseneck kettle heat up quickly, and it only takes 3 to 5 minutes to boil a pot of 0.8L water. Greatly reduces the waiting time for brewing coffee or tea. After heating, you can set the desired temperature and press the keep warm button to keep warm. So you can get warm water to brew coffee or tea at any time.
product_details: Special Feature 2.0-INCH LCD DISPLAY, Automatic Shut-Off, Boil Dry Protection, KEEP WARM FUNCTION, QUICK+QUIET HEATING, ±1°F TEMPERATURE CONTROL
